CustomField.formula: IF( QB_Preferred_Delivery_Method__c ='1','Cash', IF( QB_Preferred_Delivery_Method__c ='2','Check', IF( QB_Preferred_Delivery_Method__c ='3','Visa', IF( QB_Preferred_Delivery_Method__c ='4','MasterCard', IF( QB_Preferred_Delivery_Method__c ='5','Discover', IF( QB_Preferred_Delivery_Method__c ='6','American Express', IF( QB_Preferred_Delivery_Method__c ='8','Debit Card','None' )))))))
CustomField.label: Delivery Method
